joelib2.io
Class BasicReader

java.lang.Object
  joelib2.io.BasicReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
MoleculeReader
public class BasicReader
extends Object
implements MoleculeReader

Simple reader implementation. For speed optimization of loading descriptor molecule files have a look at the ResultFactory.

Author:
  • Jörg Kurt Wegner.
CVS Version:
Revision: 1.3Date: 2005/02/17 16:48:34source code (CVS head)
